markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Prepare Papers](/Feats.aspx?ID=3570) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 78

**Archetype** [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183)

**Prerequisites**
[Alkenstar Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3568); Master in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority. You can [Create a Forgery](/Actions.aspx?ID=60) as an [exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66) activity. It takes you about 1 hour per page of the document that you're forging. This time is reduced to 10 minutes per page if you're legendary in Society.
name: Prepare Papers
prerequisite: Alkenstar Agent Dedication; Master in Society
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 78
